person.name: Skyler B. Fly-Wilson
person.summary: Full Stack Developer with 10 years of experience helping artists and producers reach global audiences through innovative tools and systems. Experienced in live events and business operations, creating seamless technical solutions that bring creative visions to life.

roles.title: Co-Founder & Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Deployed Icecast audio streaming servers on GCP with Docker.
Implemented automation improving uptime and reliability by 95%.
Lead content production, syndication, promotion, and training initiatives, growing community engagement.
Moved VPS providers, lowering server costs by 80%.

roles.title: Smart Contract Developer
responsibilities: Developed smart contracts and on-chain random number generators for generative art projects.
Collaborated with executive, creative, and marketing teams to align technical solutions with project goals.
Crafted generative artwork using Solidity.
achievements: Protected the value of $1.4 billion in generative art sales

roles.title: Lead Web3 Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Developed smart contracts and on-chain random number generators for generative NFT projects.
Collaborated with executive, creative, and marketing teams to align technical solutions with project goals.
Crafted generative artwork using Solidity.
achievements: Protected the value of $1.4 billion in generative art sales

roles.title: Lead Web3 Systems Engineer
responsibilities: Developed smart contracts and on-chain random number generators for generative NFT projects.
Built serverless metadata APIs to simplify deployment of generative artwork.
Crafted generative artwork using SVG, JavaScript, and Solidity.
Collaborated with executive, creative, and marketing teams to align technical solutions with project goals.
achievements: Protected the value of $1.4 billion in generative art sales

roles.title: Technician & Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Built out WiFi networks with solar systems, bringing households in rural communities online.
Developed internal tools with React, Node.js, and SQL to monitor network quality metrics, leading to more informed upgrade plans.
Created automation scripts, reducing maintenance time by 99%.
Led efforts to improve network speed, security, and reliability through channel plans, regular updates, and hardware upgrades.
achievements: Achieved a 75% reduction in customer service calls involving service quality

roles.title: Audio Engineer & Stage Manager
responsibilities: Produced and managed the Bacon Bourbon and Brews stage at Frozen Dead Guy Days festival, coordinating performances, scheduling, and stage operations.
Managed stage setup and monitor mixing at The Caribou Room, ensuring smooth, high-quality performances.
Handled on-site audio troubleshooting, ensuring reliable sound for multiple live acts under tight time constraints.
achievements: Delivered successful multi-day festival stage operations with no downtime
Improved stage turnaround efficiency through optimized setup and teardown workflows

roles.title: Full Stack Developer (Contract)
responsibilities: Led development of a web application to query and compute statistics from a production SQL database.
Built interactive data visualizations using PHP and Google's Visualization API.
Collaborated with remote teams to ensure reliable data access and performance in production environments.
achievements: Delivered reliable visualization tools for live operational data
Enhanced decision-making capabilities through real-time analytics

roles.title: SysAdmin & Video Production (Contract)
responsibilities: Deployed an Open edX Docker container on DigitalOcean and configured extensions and user accounts.
Optimized system stability and performance on a low-memory Debian server.
Produced and edited multi-camera educational video content using Sony Vegas.
Collaborated with educators and technical staff to integrate video content into the e-learning platform.
achievements: Successfully deployed a production-grade Open edX instance on resource-limited infrastructure
Improved server stability and performance for educational video streaming

projects.title: Radio Control System — Radio DJ Web Control Panel
projects.description: Built a web interface for Radio DJ software to control streams, manage playlists, and automate operations.
outcomes: Enabled web-based control for Radio DJ software
Improved automation and reliability of community radio broadcasts

projects.title: SkylerFly.com — Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern responsive personal portfolio site showcasing software, art, and live production work.
outcomes: Showcases full-stack projects and creative technology work
Implemented CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment via Netlify
Improved personal brand visibility and client outreach

projects.title: Light Artwork — Networked Light Systems
projects.description: Interactive and generative light installations using networked microcontrollers, LEDs, and wireless connectivity.
outcomes: Created physical and app-based control interfaces for lighting installations
Integrated responsive light behaviors with sound and environmental input
Demonstrated innovative use of embedded systems in creative art contexts
